job.title: Frontend Software Engineer
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongAt Aurora were on a mission to deliver the benefits of selfdriving technology safely quickly and broadly It all starts with the Aurora Driver a platform created from industryleading hardware and software and designed to adapt across a variety of vehicle types and industriesbrbrWere led by a team of selfdriving luminaries and weve forged strategic partnerships with leading transportation companiesincluding ridehailing network Uber truckmanufacturers PACCAR and Volvo Trucks and the worlds largest automaker Toyotasetting us up to deliver the Aurora Driver in both trucks and passenger vehicles We are funded by Amazon Uber T Rowe Price and some of Silicon Valleys best venture capital firms including Sequoia Greylock and Index VenturesbrbrAurora is in the best position to lead the selfdriving space with a team of unparalleled depth and expertise the technology to deliver and the partnerships to build a transformative business for the longtermbrbrAurora hires talented people with diverse backgrounds who are ready to help build a transportation ecosystem that will make our roads safer get crucial goods where they need to go and make mobility more efficient and accessible for all Were searching for a strongFrontend Software Engineer brbrstrongstrongIn this role you willbrstrongul liBuild and ship the web applications that train our Deep Learning models and enable autonomy at Aurora to scaleli brbrulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongul listrongPhenomenal communication skillsstrong We build software strongforstrong people We build software strongwithstrong people You know how to write an effective technical spec provide feedback to others translate technical concepts into lay terms and incorporate feedback into your efforts You value and practice openness empathy kindness and collaborationli listrongA preference for actionstrong You will use good judgment to balance speed and quality You will deliver products that are built in a responsible and sustainable way You will use a selfstarter mentality to thrive in a growing environment where all hands are on deck and consider no obstacle too big or too small You will notice where there is a need and will hustle to fill itli listrongThe drive to make teams strongerstrong Youre excited to work hard and fast to the finish line on new opportunities with a collaborative and integrated team You will be proactive in engaging conflict with openness patience and kindness in an environment where it is safe to lean on each other and learn from failuresli listrongFrontend Engineering strongYou are comfortable writing code in strongJavascriptstrong We do the bulk of our work in strongReactstrong but we welcome candidates with broader JS experienceli brulstrongDesirablebrstrongul liExperience working with mapping or geospatial technologiesli brbrulstrongWorking at AurorabrbrstrongAt Aurora we bring together people with extraordinary talent and experience united by the strength of our values We operate with integrity set outrageous goals and continue to build a culture where we win togetherall without any jerksbrbrstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongWe also offer a competitive benefits package that supports the whole you includingbrbrWe have offices in Pittsburgh Mountain View San Francisco Bozeman Dallas and Seattlebrul liCompetitive salary bonus and RSU packageli liPremium choices for Medical vision and dentalli li401k benefitsli liLife and disability benefitsli li18 weeks paid leave for new parents and caregiversli liFlexible vacation and company paid holidaysli liFertility benefits through Carrotli liWorking from home supportli liProfessional growth and mentorship opportunities through the Aurora Academyli liWellness Platforms Spring Health Headspace Aaptiv Quit Geniusli brulWe believe that selfdriving technology has broad benefits  including an increase in safety and access to transportation  and to achieve those benefits we want and need a workforce with diverse experiences insights and perspectives said another way a workforce that reflects the communities and people our technology will benefitbrbremIndividuals seeking employment at Aurora are considered without regard to race color religion national origin age sex gender gender identity gender expression sexual orientation marital status pregnancy status parent or caregiver status ancestry political affiliation veteran andor military status physical or mental disability or any other status protected by federal or state law Your responses or your choice not to respond will not be associated with your specific application nor will they be used in the selection process or in making any hiring decisionbrbremstronguAbout AurorabrbrustrongFounded in 2017 Aurora was started by industry luminaries and now were a team with a multitude of perspectives and experiences Chris Urmson helped lead Carnegie Mellons efforts in Darpas Grand Challenges then was a founding member of Googles selfdriving team Sterling Anderson worked on the tech at MIT before leading Teslas Model X and Autopilot programs Drew Bagnell also a Carnegie Mellon alum is a machine learning expert who helped build Ubers autonomy effort Regarded as the most experienced leadership team in the industry these three bring decades of expertise passion and focus to realizing our mission
